metadata.title: Which IDE to use for RH850 devices ?

sections.content: Which IDE to use for RH850 devices ?
The selection of IDE depends on your personal preference and which compiler are you using.
If you are using the GHS compiler, it is recommended to use also the GHS MULTI IDE. Alternatively you can use e² studio or Renesas CS+ IDE.
If you are using the Renesas CC-RH compiler you can choose between e² studio and CS+.
If you are using the IAR compiler, it is recommended to use the IAR Embedded Workbench. Alternatively you can use e2 studio.
